com.jackstockley.addressbookcli

Class AddressBook

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jackstockley.addressbookcli.AddressBook

  • public class AddressBook
extends java.lang.Object
    This program allows a user to interact with an address book that is saved on a MySQL database over the Internet!
    Version:
    2.1
    Author:
    jnstockley

        Returns:

                                         java.sql.Connection conn)

        table - The table the user wants to interact with
